actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965, as amended.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1643) Provides, under the Land and Water Conservation Act, that a single visit permit to enter National recreation areas be established for persons who do not buy an annual pass. Provides that such a permit shall allow the holder to exit and reenter the concerned area for a period from one to fifteen days which the administering Secretary has determined to be reasonably and ordinarily necessary for a single visit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965, as amended.
